title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No.
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties 
of the Minister for Rural and Community Development conferred on her by 
or under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe 
O'Brien, Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community 
Development. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [240] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister rural community development conferred enactment specified schedule delegated joe brien minister state department rural community development notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th may 2024 240 3

title: 2(1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No.
heading: Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Viet. c. 78)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Viet. c. 78) 

Charities Act 1961 (No. 17 of 196 l) 

Street and House to House Collections Act 1962 (No. 13 of 1962) 

Dormant Accounts Act 2001 (No. 32 of 2001) 

Unclaimed Life Assurance Policies Act 2003 (No. 2 of 2003) 

Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009) (other than section 13 of that Act) 

Dormant Accounts (Amendment) Act 2012 (No. 23 of 2012) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
21 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach.
